songs.title: NYC (The Way Out)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
All alone on the city high
In New York in the dead of night
We can't swim and we're about to jump
All alone in a famous town

[Chorus]
We always knew we never would survive
Protect all us are higher in the night
We on the way, on the way out
We on the way, on the way out
Doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo

[Verse 2]
No oxygen left in our hearts
Goin' down and we felt the pain
But we're lookin' cool, sinking in the chain
We feel the same as we fall apart
I was in the blue and the lights behind us
Shot us in the back but keep on ridin'
I don't wanna go where the lights is blinding

[Chorus]
We always knew we never would survive
Protect all us are higher in the night
We on the way, on the way out
We on the way, on the way out
Doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo
Doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo, doo-doo

[Chorus]
We always knew we never would survive (survive)
Protect all us are higher in the night
We on the way, on the way out
We on the way, on the way out (on the way out, way out)
We always knew we never would survive (survive)
Protect all us are higher in the night
We on the way, on the way out
We on the way, on the way out (on the way out, way out)

[Outro]
All alone on the city high
In New York in the dead of night
